item.title: Russian space official: “We need to stop lying to ourselves” about health of industry
item.description: “A significant part of the team has lost motivation and a sense of shared responsibility.”

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.
